_comments.description: Source configuration for India AI Tracker
_comments.types: rss = RSS feed, web = HTML scraping
_comments.state: State code or null for national/all-India sources
_comments.geo_mode: strict = only use if content explicitly mentions this state, default = use as fallback if no other state found, force = always assign this state
_comments.priority: very_high, high, medium, low - affects processing order
_comments.notes: These sources feed ALL 28 states + All India panel. Geographic attribution happens dynamically based on content.
